title: Development of a Customized Online Instructional Design Model to Strengthen Foundational Physical Chemistry Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemistry theory and mathematical problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Requires optimization for smartphone-based learning environments and support for interpreting specialized chemistry terminology

learning_goals: Learners can explain over 80% of core physical chemistry concepts (thermodynamics, quantum chemistry, etc.) through context-specific case applications
Learners can mathematically model chemical reaction processes and improve prediction accuracy by over 70%
Learners can collaboratively solve complex chemistry problems with peer learners using online collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
